title: ðŸŒ± Garden & Planting (Days 8-10)
goal: Establish a small productive garden to provide fresh vegetables, herbs, and eggs for the family.

steps.title: Prepare garden beds
steps.description: Level ground and place raised beds. Ensure good sunlight exposure.

steps.title: Add soil and compost
steps.description: Fill beds with 50% soil, 50% compost mixture.

steps.title: Plant seeds or seedlings
steps.description: Follow spacing guidelines for each plant. Water gently after planting.

tips: ðŸ’¡ Companion planting improves yields and deters pests.
ðŸ’¡ Use mulch around garden beds to retain moisture.
ðŸ’¡ Rotate crops in the garden to avoid soil depletion.
safety: Wear gloves when handling soil, compost, or manure.
